website_summaries.verdict: This fun ocean themed rocker-chair combo is ideal for parents who also enjoy the sounds of the ocean.
pros: Grows with your child – can be set up as an infant rocker or a toddler chair
Fun ocean theme stimulates the senses with ocean wave sounds and comforting vibrations
Comes with a removable toy bar to keep babies happy when they are not sleeping
cons: Some wish it had a 5-point harness, and that it could rock on its own, as you need to rock it manually

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Updating my previous review. I'm kinda disappointed. Seat has no soothing qualities. Only upbeat music designed to stimulate baby, the music only has two settings loud and louder, and you can't turn on music only or lights only. It's an all or nothing setup. I love baby einstein products, I've been using them for 14 yrs, and my previous experiences were all top notch, so I was kinda shocked to find so many flaws with this seat.
customer_reviews.author: maura

customer_reviews.title: Vibration is dead.
customer_reviews.text: The vibration goes out, the first one I bought the vibration didn't even work. I emailed the company and they never got back to me I ended up and they told me that they would put in another request. Fine, I wait another couple days only for them to tell me the part is out of stock and they can just offer me a refund if I show them that I destroyed it. I just did a return through Amazon instead. Now the vibration is going out on this one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: ... buying this just buy it you will not be disappointed my little baby is starting to outgrow his little ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering buying this just buy it you will not be disappointed my little baby is starting to outgrow his little bouncer and I needed something to put him in to occupy during the daytime. He absolutely loves this. He has never been able to sleep without being bounced or rocked . But I can just let him fall asleep in my arms and simply lay him in this and he will stay asleep it's the craziest thing. This is an absolute must buy
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: This chair does it all!
customer_reviews.text: I should have had this weeks ago! My 1st son lived in his Fisher price rainforest/ jungle chair from 2 weeks until I want to say 5 months (he was too big but it was perfect for my showers and busy stuff for me to get done. Well, that chair broke (was a hand me down from twins so it had a long life) and its discontinued! There are soooooo many vibrating bouncer chairs out there and this one does it all! Has lights, cute classical songs, rattles, strong vibration and bonus toys to play with! It has been 20 minutes and we are still hanging out in it.
customer_reviews.author: nefertiti thomas

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Caterpillar's Day at the Park version of the Baby Einstein Bouncer for my infant granddaughter to use when she visits. Though I was a bit concerned by some comments about challenging assembly, I didn't have a problem. The bouncer is colorful, baby appears to be comfortable and entertained by the hanging toy figures on the crossbar. The bouncer is light which makes it easy to move around. The music leaves something to be desired. But, overall, the bouncer is serving its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: lz

customer_reviews.title: Buy it early
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at around 4 months for my baby and he used it every day up until around 6 months. I wish I had it sooner bc once he hit 7 months he started trying to flip over & didn’t want to be in it at all. I still use the toys bc he loves them! Def recommend from birth to 6 months
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but switches need worked on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair overall. However, for the price I would've thought it would've been better made. The on and off switch for the vibrating is loose and annoying when turned on so I don't use it like i want to and the switch to go between mom controlled fun and self fun doesn't work. It only works for mom controlled fun. Everything else works and is great. my daughter loves it, but I really would've liked her to enjoy the self fun option when she moves or grabs the toys it goes off.
customer_reviews.author: Kailye Kiernan

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!!
customer_reviews.text: This rocking chair is great. And my baby loves seating in it. I love that this chair supports up to 40 lbs as most other rockers/bouncers only go up to 25 lbs. Assembly is really easy. It has a kick stand that prevents the chair from rocking, so you can use it as regular chair. The security harness is also better then in other rocking chairs. I was considering Fisher Price infant to toddler rocker too however when I saw the reviews with photos of babies hanging after the chair tipped forward too much I was afraid for my babies safety and decided to go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bluszcz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Interactive, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this bouncer! It is so cute and has the features I used to find from my Fisher Price bouncer my older son loved. In fact, this is the only bouncer I could find with interactive toys on the bar. However... For a bouncer that costs almost double what other bouncers cost, I would expect it to be made better. The vibrating mechanism in the seat rattles and it drives me insane! It's the actual button that you switch back and forth to make it vibrate that rattles. It's annoying enough that I am considering sending it back. I hate returns but it is worth returning if I can't make it stop.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: It's very colorful, love the rocking part. You really have to jerk the hang down toys for the thing on top to spin. I don't know if there is something wrong with the music, but it plays normal some times, and super fast other times. Our little guy doesn't like the vibrating feature. It would be nice if the toy bar had lights that would light up when you pull the toys, I think it's boring, our little one likes it though.
customer_reviews.author: CJMAVEN

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresented and damaged  /  not disclosed
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was represented as new, with an open box, but instead came WITHOUT the light and had the straps CUT. We will be able to sew and fix the straps, but will have to do without the light. Honesty does mean something and this was a fraudulent listing by an amazon merchant. Shame on you!!
customer_reviews.author: R L Beach

customer_reviews.title: Good Bouncer
customer_reviews.text: The straps and buckle are not efficient or well placed. The buckle sits under a Velcro cloth flap that is easily undone by an infant and is more of a hassle than expected. Toy bar is great and overall the chair is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Came missing some screws. Also the vibration part seems to have a short. It run at full strength then tappers off. If you tap the side of it it revs back up. And yes I’ve replaced the batteries. The kid doesn’t mind sitting in it with out the vibration so we were not sending back. But poorly made
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The straps were designed Horibly
customer_reviews.text: The straps are impossible to thread through the plastic attachments. I bought 2 chairs in hopes I would use one for each grand child- sending second one back as the straps are useless!
customer_reviews.author: Girlinmtns

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby bouncer. The only thing I would change is the type of sound to more of white noise instead of music, other than that this bouncer in very easy to put together and makes it easy for me to watch my new grandbaby so I can get stuff done. lol
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: love this chair! and the music is fun.
customer_reviews.text: our daughter has loved this since a newborn! This was the only thing we could get her to have a full night's sleep in before transitioning to her rocker bouncer and a crib. To this day (11mo) we use it for naps and she loves playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after one month
customer_reviews.text: After one month of use it stopped vibrating, I replaced batteries and it still will not vibrate it plays music but nothing else. I wouldn’t waste your money on this brand!! I wouldn’t even give this 1 star!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jan H Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Love the bouncer my only issue is that the top part isn’t very study but I guess it’s ok since my 7 mo baby is kicking it off .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost didn’t buy, wish we bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: Finally something our baby will stay in , good positioning if your baby has reflux
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great. The only thing that I would improve on it is to make it light up for more entertainment for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Conklin

customer_reviews.title: The shoulder straps for safety makes this worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific chair! Our little girl was sitting up in her bouncy, very early, making it unsafe for her tipping over. The fact that this has the over the shoulder straps for extra protection is an absolute life saver. The straps are also adjustable to fit her as she grows. The only issue we had was the toy strap does not stay in place and our little girl tends to pull it out. Other than that, I would absolutely recommend this product and buy it again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: DominoDiva

customer_reviews.title: Niece approved!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves her bouncy seat! As always, well done! We love the music, vibration option, and toys.
customer_reviews.author: K. Snipes

customer_reviews.title: it'll be nice for him to have a rocking chair to use ...
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this all the time. We have to use the harness right now but once he gets more stable, it'll be nice for him to have a rocking chair to use when watching tv
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: No movement on it’s own!!
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed. The floor model was labeled bounce/ rocker. Doesn’t bounce, or rock on its own.. it sort of vibrates. The motor is loud. The songs change too frequently. Overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Alre83

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: The bouncer was good quality for the price. It has sound and vibration in the seat and is large enough for the baby to grow into.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy T

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month old loves this bouncer.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old loves this bouncer. The only issue is the buttons stick so it doesn't light up the way it should otherwise I would have given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O.

customer_reviews.title: I loved my bouncer when I had babies!
customer_reviews.text: Cute bouncer in picture haven't opened it, it is for a baby shower. Hope they like it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and I highly recommend it, and the rocking feature is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Angel T

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My baby love it and it’s so easy to clean .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The vibrator is very loud. The baby activated sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: The vibrator is very loud. The baby activated sounds takes a lot of movement on their part to play.
customer_reviews.author: Berryfamily9

customer_reviews.title: NO Batteries
customer_reviews.text: It is a really nice swing. However i do not like the fact that it does not come with any battery. They could have provided batteries the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Terrell and Shawneca

customer_reviews.title: Huge and noisy
customer_reviews.text: Huge! And makes a horrible rattling aound when it vibrates. No baby could sleep in it
customer_reviews.author: Lplaisance

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves the chair
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is three months old and this is perfect for him. I can put him in this chair while I make dinner or if I have to be on the computer for a small amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and colorful, but the piece with the toys on doesn’t click in properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Its not to bad to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month loves it! Its not to bad to assemble, 2 people together make it easier, but you can do on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Karena

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and transport
customer_reviews.text: Keeps our little in e entertained. Easy to build and transport. The bar needs a locking mechanism, as it can come down quickly when you are trying to remove your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P Harries

customer_reviews.title: Very close to face
customer_reviews.text: The hanging toys r so close to the babys face
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is really handy because it's easy to move around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Frecks

customer_reviews.title: It’s a must
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his chair it’s his favorite wish we bought it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product my son 2 months loved it and was entertained for hours
customer_reviews.author: Anita Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it! We love it! Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Wanous

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really like the seat design and print. I cannot use the vibrate feature on the seat though. It rattles loudly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: somehow it makes alot of noise when i turn the ...
customer_reviews.text: somehow it makes alot of noise when i turn the vibration on. About to return it and price a little to high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! My little one really enjoys pulling on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this ! My little one really enjoys pulling on the dangling toys and the vibration always calms him down.
customer_reviews.author: The Sorokas

customer_reviews.title: The vibration is heard 10 miles away
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if it was a bad choice out just the one I got. The vibration is extremely loud on this chair and honestly speaking I'm beyond sick and tired of disassembling, putting back in the box and returning. I had to do that with the one before cuz it didn't have the music option
customer_reviews.author: Nzihu k

customer_reviews.title: but when it arrived the packaging looked a little banged up and like it had been repackaged
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this item, but when it arrived the packaging looked a little banged up and like it had been repackaged. Also it's quite a lot of work to assemble. Also, there are less interactive items than I excepted. Baby is only 2 months old so maybe I expected more lights and sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So Great! Love it! My grandson really enjoys this. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette ONeil

product_meta.title: Baby Einstein Ocean Adventure Rocker
product_meta.description: Style:Ocean AdventureThis seafaring chair features two parent must-haves in one – easily converting from a newborn rocker to a toddler recliner as your baby grows. With soothing ocean sounds and classical music just a button away, you can rock your baby to the rhythm of the reef when used as a baby seat. For the moments you need an extra set of hands, a vibration setting steps in to comfort your baby. The removable toy bar adds an extra splash of activity. Your little one will love pulling on the Baby Neptune rattle, exploring the octopus bead chaser, and spinning the discovery paddle to reveal real-life underwater imagery. When the toddler years sneak up, this chair is the perfect captain’s seat for a good book or seated playtime.
feature_bullets: An ocean of discovery awaits for baby or toddler
Sea-themed rocker for baby boy or girl
Adjusts from rocker to fixed positions
Vibration and ocean sounds soothe baby
Easily converts from baby rocker to toddler chair

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars201 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
